name: drilly
title: Drilly
author: Muhib Beekun
description: Enhance your mining operations with Drilly! This mod meticulously monitors all mining drills, providing real-time insights into their performance and efficiency. Easily track resource yields, drill statuses, and productivity bonuses directly through an intuitive in-game interface. Whether you're managing a small base or overseeing a sprawling mining network, Drilly equips you with the essential data to optimize your resource extraction strategies.
